name: Amelia South
what_you_do: Executive coaching for CEO and executive moms, helping them reclaim time, delegate effectively, and lead with confidence at work and home.
business_focus: Executive and leadership coaching for CEO and executive moms to reclaim time, delegate, and lead confidently.
bio: Amelia is an executive coach based in San Diego, CA, dedicated to professional coaching since 2007. She specializes in coaching CEO and executive moms to lead with less stress and more clarity. Unlike many executives who turn to coaching as a second act, Amelia has been committed to coaching as her primary career.
service_provided: Executive coaching, leadership coaching, leadership training, EMMPOWER cohort program, strategy calls
